headline: Upbeat Guidance and M&A Focus Could Be a Game Changer for Medtronic (MDT)
summary: Medtronic reported strong second-quarter results and raised its revenue and earnings guidance for the coming quarters and fiscal years, with management highlighting a renewed focus on tuck-in acquisitions in higher-growth cardiology and neuroscience segments. The company’s emphasis on investments in near- or on-market technologies, alongside upward guidance revisions, signals confidence in ongoing innovation and execution across its core businesses. We’ll examine how this improved outlook...
